name: Ghost Town (itch) (Rajcsányi László)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy (DMG). Original version: Udo Gertz - Kingsoft/Anirog. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Original Story:

A graphic adventure with 19 high resolution graphic screen to test your wit. Long ago, Belegro the wizard had cast a spell that turned a prosperous little town into a GHOST TOWN. He collected all things of value and stored them in one room. You may be clever enough to solve all the clues and find your way to Belegro guarding the treasure. You may even kill him but the treasure is not yours yet. 

Controls on original machine:

Start the game: Start or Select
Move: Cursor Keys

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Shift or Enter
Move: Arrow Keys

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: http://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Ghost_Town
